description: Attempting to access an array or list index that doesn't exist. Common when iterating or accessing elements without bounds checking.
commonCauses: Off-by-one errors in loops (using <= instead of <)
Assuming list has elements without checking isEmpty()
RecyclerView position out of bounds after data change
solutions: Use for (item in list) instead of index-based loops
prevention: Prefer forEach, map, filter over manual indexing
Use collection safe accessors: first(), last(), getOrNull()
Avoid removing items during iteration - use removeIf()
Use concurrent collections if modifying from multiple threads
Always check isEmpty() before accessing first/last
